properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 5 at 3:12PM EST until January 7 at 4:00AM EST by NWS Albany NY
properties.description:
* WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 6
inches.

* WHERE...Northern Herkimer County.

* WHEN...From 4 AM Monday to 4 AM EST Tuesday.

* IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous
conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow begins late tonight and continues
through late Monday night. The steadiest snow will occur as lake
effect snow Monday afternoon and evening. Snowfall rates up to
one inch per hour are possible.
properties.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 4 AM MONDAY TO 4 AM EST TUESDAY
